mutants.original_line: return all(dfs(node) for node in graph if node not in color)
mutants.mutated_line: return all((dfs(node) for node in graph if node in color))

mutants.original_line: return all(dfs(nei, c ^ 1) for nei in graph[node])
mutants.mutated_line: return all((dfs(nei, c | 1) for nei in graph[node]))

mutants.original_line: return all(dfs(nei, c ^ 1) for nei in graph[node])
mutants.mutated_line: return all((dfs(nei, c ^ 2) for nei in graph[node]))

mutants.original_line: return all(dfs(nei, c ^ 1) for nei in graph[node])
mutants.mutated_line: return all((dfs(nei, c ^ 0) for nei in graph[node]))

mutants.original_line: return all(dfs(nei, c ^ 1) for nei in graph[node])
mutants.mutated_line: return all((dfs(nei, c ^ 0) for nei in graph[node]))

mutants.original_line: return all(dfs(nei, c ^ 1) for nei in graph[node])
mutants.mutated_line: return all((dfs(nei, c ^ -1) for nei in graph[node]))
